CustomField.description: Setting this will override applicant type for this event and the user will not be queried about what applicant type they are. Use this if you know the event is only for a and audience of registrants that fall under the same application type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Setting this will override applicant type for this event and the user will not be queried about what applicant type they are. Use this if you know the event is only for a and audience of registrants that fall under the same application type.
CustomField.label: Ask Applicant Type

value.fullName: Do not ask but assign First-Year
value.label: Do not ask but assign First-Year

value.fullName: Do not ask but assign Transfer
value.label: Do not ask but assign Transfer

value.fullName: Do not ask but assign Graduate
value.label: Do not ask but assign Graduate
